verses.roman:
etat te sarvam ākhyātaṁ
yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā
tat kaumāre hari-kṛtaṁ
paugaṇḍe parikīrtitam

synonyms: etat—this; te—unto you; sarvam—all; ākhyātam—described; yat—which; pṛṣṭaḥ—requested; aham—I; iha—in this regard; tvayā—by you; tat—that; kaumāre—in His early childhood (up to the end of His fifth year); hari-kṛtam—performed by Lord Hari; paugaṇḍe—in later childhood (beginning with His sixth year); parikīrtitam—glorified.
translation: Since you inquired from me, I have fully described to you those activities of Lord Hari that were performed in His fifth year but not celebrated until His sixth.
